name: RollUp
description:
In RollUp, you play as a simple ball with headphones to climb up and around obstacles, with precise timing, and hard momentum-based controls. The core game is very hard, so thee is a warning. Alongside this, there is a two player minigame mode, to complete small challenges the fastest. (In Development) If you can beat my speedrun time of 4:12 min in the single player mode, then good for you.

This is my very first game that I've ever made, and was made with almost no prior experience apart from YouTube tutorials. As a result, I only want to improve from here. All of the assets in the game were made by me, from the bad models, to the awful music. Feel free to comment things I should work on, and ridicule me if you want anything added, or if I should expand the game. Thank you!
